pr_title: HDDS-3518: Add a freon generator to create directory tree and create …

timeline.message: HDDS-3518: Add a freon generator to create directory tree and create files in each directory
Fixed checkstyle and refactored code to avoid code duplication

timeline.bodyText: Can we wrap this with try {} finally {shutdown (cluster)} so that the cluster is ensured to shutdown if any verification failed?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: Sure, I will update this in next PR commit.
replies.author: rakeshadr

timeline.bodyText: "Hadoop FS directory system path" is a bit confusing, do you mean "Hadoop FS root path"?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText:
Thanks @xiaoyuyao for the reviews.
Yes, its "Hadoop FS root path". I will modify to make it clear.
replies.author: rakeshadr

timeline.message: Fixed checkstyle comment - more than 7 parameters
Modified the file size unit to bytes from KB
Fixed failed test case which was due to the KBs to bytes filesize changes
